鳥.definition: bird; CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]; "bird" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 196); (dialect) to pay attention to; (intensifier) damned; goddamn

鳥不拉屎，雞不生蛋.pinyin: niao3 bu4 la1 shi3 , ji1 bu4 sheng1 dan4
鳥不拉屎，雞不生蛋.definition: lit. (a place where) birds don't defecate and hens don't lay eggs (idiom); fig. god-forsaken; remote and desolate

鳥不生蛋，狗不拉屎.pinyin: niao3 bu4 sheng1 dan4 , gou3 bu4 la1 shi3
鳥不生蛋，狗不拉屎.definition: lit. (a place where) birds don't lay eggs and dogs don't defecate (idiom); fig. god-forsaken; remote and desolate

鳥人.definition: (vulgar) damned wretch; fucker; also pr. [niao3 ren2]

鳥嘌呤.definition: guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)

鳥居.definition: torii (gateway of a Shinto shrine) (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 鳥居 "torii")

鳥巢.definition: bird's nest; nickname for Beijing 2008 Olympic stadium

鳥槍.definition: flintlock musket; fowling piece (shotgun); air gun

鳥槍換炮.definition: bird shotgun replaced by cannon (idiom); equipment improved enormously

鳥獸散.definition: to scatter like birds and beasts

鳥盡弓藏.definition: lit. the birds are over, the bow is put away (idiom); fig. to get rid of sb once he has served his purpose

鳥瞰.definition: to get a bird's-eye view; bird's-eye view; broad overview

鳥瞰圖.definition: bird's-eye view; see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]

鳥篆.definition: bird characters (a decorated form of the Great Seal)

鳥腳下目.definition: Ornithopoda, suborder of herbivorous dinosaurs including iguanodon

鳥蟲書.definition: bird writing, a calligraphic style based on seal script 篆書|篆书[zhuan4 shu1], but with characters decorated as birds and insects

鳥語花香.definition: lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day

鳥道.definition: a road only a bird can manage; steep dangerous road
